messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] School is Hell
messages.msgSnippet: I ve made several hour-long TV programs,  called School is Hell and they play regularly on cable access hereabouts. I m sure those make a little Hell for the
messages.messageBody:
I've made several hour-long TV programs, called "School is
Hell" and they play regularly on cable access hereabouts. I'm sure those
make a little Hell for the local school pushers. (anyone want copies?)

Hi dear Ned,
I want copies of these programs of yours or let me know what the channel is!

A hug from Puerto Rico,
Betty




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] School is Hell
messages.msgSnippet: ... I d also be interested. Tia No one can make you feel inferior without your consent. Eleanor Roosevelt ********************************************* Tia
